author: defranchis
body: Adding functionality to retrieve and apply pre-scale weights to TopMonitor in order to get meaningful efficiency plots for pre-scaled HLT paths. Unfortunately the prescaleWeightProvider seems not to be working at the moment due to a problem with l1GtTriggerMenuLite, so the change will only have effect once the problem is fixed. For the moment, all weights are equal to 1 and no change will be visible in the efficiency plots
title: Correct prescales
